verses.verse: Now there was a man <S%H376><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Kish <S%H7027><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiel <S%H22><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeror <S%H6872><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Becorath <S%H1064><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aphiah <S%H647><s%>, the son of a Benjamite <S%H1145><s%>, a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>.

And he had a son <S%H1121><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Saul <S%H7586><s%>, a young man <S%H970><s%> and a goodly <S%H2896><s%>: and there was not among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a goodlier <S%H2896><s%> person <S%H376><s%> than he <S%H7926><s%>: from his shoulders and upward <S%H4605><s%> he was higher <S%H1364><s%> than any of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the asses <S%H860><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%>, Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s father <S%H1><s%>, were lost <S%H6><s%>. And Kish <S%H7027><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> now one <S%H259><s%> of the servants <S%H5288><s%> with thee <S%H6965><s%>, and arise, go <S%H3212><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> the asses <S%H860><s%>.

And he passed through <S%H5674><s%> the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and passed through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Shalishah <S%H8031><s%>, but they found <S%H4672><s%> them not <S%H5674><s%>: then they passed through the land <S%H776><s%> of Shaalim <S%H8171><s%>, and there they were not <S%H5674><s%>: and he passed through the land <S%H776><s%> of the Benjamites <S%H1145><s%>, but they found them not <S%H4672><s%>.

When they were come <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Zuph <S%H6689><s%>, Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servant <S%H5288><s%> that was with him <S%H3212><s%>, Come, and let us return <S%H7725><s%>, lest my father <S%H1><s%> leave <S%H2308><s%> off caring for the asses <S%H860><s%>, and be anxious for us <S%H1672><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5892><s%>, Behold now, there is in this city a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and he is a man <S%H376><s%> that is held in honor <S%H3513><s%>; all that he saith <S%H1696><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> surely to pass <S%H935><s%>: now let us go <S%H3212><s%> thither <S%H5046><s%>; peradventure he can tell us concerning our journey <S%H1870><s%> whereon we go <S%H1980><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to his servant <S%H5288><s%>, But <S%H3212><s%>, behold, if we go, what shall we bring <S%H935><s%> the man <S%H376><s%>? for the bread <S%H3899><s%> is spent <S%H235><s%> in our vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and there is not a present <S%H8670><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: what have we?

And the servant <S%H5288><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> again <S%H3254><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H4672><s%>, I have in my hand <S%H3027><s%> the fourth part <S%H7253><s%> of a shekel <S%H8255><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>: that will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, to tell <S%H5046><s%> us our way <S%H1870><s%>.

(Beforetime <S%H6440><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when a man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, thus he said <S%H559><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us go <S%H3212><s%> to the seer <S%H7200><s%>; for he that is now <S%H3117><s%> called a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> was beforetime <S%H6440><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> a Seer <S%H7200><s%>.)

Then said <S%H1697><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to his servant <S%H5288><s%>, Well <S%H2896><s%> said <S%H559><s%>; come <S%H3212><s%>, let us go <S%H3212><s%>. So they went <S%H3212><s%> unto the city <S%H5892><s%> where the man <S%H376><s%> of God was <S%H430><s%>.

As they went up <S%H5927><s%> the ascent <S%H5927><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%>, they found <S%H4672><s%> young maidens <S%H5291><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3426><s%>, Is the seer here <S%H7200><s%>?

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, and said, He is <S%H3426><s%>; behold <S%H6440><s%>, he is before thee <S%H4116><s%>: make haste now <S%H935><s%>, for he is come to-day <S%H3117><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>; for the people <S%H5971><s%> have a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> to-day <S%H3117><s%> in the high place <S%H1116><s%>:

as soon as ye are come <S%H935><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, ye shall straightway <S%H3651><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> him <S%H5927><s%>, before he goeth up to the high place <S%H1116><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>; for the people <S%H5971><s%> will not eat <S%H398><s%> until he come <S%H935><s%>, because he doth bless <S%H1288><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>; and afterwards <S%H310><s%> they eat <S%H398><s%> that are bidden <S%H7121><s%>. Now therefore get you up <S%H5927><s%>; for at this time <S%H3117><s%> ye shall find him <S%H4672><s%>.

And they went up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H7125><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>; and as they came <S%H935><s%> within the city <S%H5892><s%>, behold <S%H8050><s%>, Samuel came out <S%H3318><s%> toward <S%H7125><s%> them <S%H5927><s%>, to go up to the high place <S%H1116><s%>.

Now Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had revealed <S%H1540><s%> unto <S%H241><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> a <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> about this time <S%H6256><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> thee a man <S%H376><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, and thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> him to be prince <S%H5057><s%> over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and he shall save <S%H3467><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: for I have looked <S%H7200><s%> upon my people <S%H5971><s%>, because their cry <S%H6818><s%> is come unto me <S%H935><s%>.

And when Samuel <S%H8050><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H6030><s%> unto him <S%H376><s%>, Behold, the man of whom I spake <S%H559><s%> to thee <S%H6113><s%>! this same shall have authority over my people <S%H5971><s%>.

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> to Samuel <S%H8050><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Tell <S%H5046><s%> me <S%H335><s%>, I pray thee, where the seer <S%H7200><s%>'s house is <S%H1004><s%>.

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, I am the seer <S%H7200><s%>; go up <S%H5927><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me unto the high place <S%H1116><s%>, for ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> with me to-day <S%H3117><s%>: and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> I will let thee go <S%H7971><s%>, and will tell <S%H5046><s%> thee all that is in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>.

And as for thine asses <S%H860><s%> that were lost <S%H6><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ago <S%H3117><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> not they mind <S%H3820><s%> on them <S%H4672><s%>; for they are found. And for whom is all that is desirable <S%H2532><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>? Is it not for thee <S%H1><s%>, and for all thy father's house <S%H1004><s%>?

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, Am not I a Benjamite <S%H1145><s%>, of the smallest <S%H6996><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? and my family <S%H4940><s%> the least <S%H6810><s%> of all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>? wherefore then speakest <S%H1696><s%> thou to me after this manner <S%H1697><s%>?

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his servant <S%H5288><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the guest-chamber <S%H3957><s%>, and made them sit <S%H5414><s%> in the chiefest <S%H7218><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> among them that were bidden <S%H7121><s%>, who were about thirty <S%H7970><s%> persons <S%H376><s%>.

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the cook <S%H2876><s%>, Bring <S%H5414><s%> the portion <S%H4490><s%> which I gave <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H559><s%>, of which I said unto thee <S%H7760><s%>, Set it by thee.

And the cook <S%H2876><s%> took up <S%H7311><s%> the thigh <S%H7785><s%>, and that which was upon it <S%H7760><s%>, and set it before <S%H6440><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>. And Samuel said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H7604><s%>, that which hath been reserved! set <S%H7760><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> thee and eat <S%H398><s%>; because unto the appointed time <S%H4150><s%> hath it been kept <S%H8104><s%> for thee <S%H559><s%>, for I said, I have invited <S%H7121><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>. So Saul <S%H7586><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> with Samuel <S%H8050><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>.
And when they were come down <S%H3381><s%> from the high place <S%H1116><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, he communed <S%H1696><s%> with Saul <S%H7586><s%> upon the housetop <S%H1406><s%>.

And they arose early <S%H7925><s%>: and it came to pass about the spring <S%H5927><s%> of the day <S%H7837><s%>, that Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> on the housetop <S%H1406><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%>, that I may send thee away <S%H7971><s%>. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and they went out <S%H3318><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them <S%H8050><s%>, he and Samuel, abroad <S%H2351><s%>.

As they were going down <S%H3381><s%> at the end <S%H7097><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Bid <S%H559><s%> the servant <S%H5288><s%> pass on <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us <S%H5674><s%> (and he passed on), but stand <S%H5975><s%> thou still first <S%H3117><s%>, that I may cause thee to hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.
